goal.tools.mc.core

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.mc.core.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Represents the controller component of GOAL's single-agent model checker, which uses LTL2AUT as LTL translation algorithm, and Tauriainen's generalized NDFS algorithm for on-the-fly exploration of the state space. Environments are not taken into consideration.
    Author:
    sungshik

    • Method Detail

      • getFirstSearchPath

        public LMHashSet<State> getFirstSearchPath()
        Gets the search path (starting from the initial state of the product automaton) that the exploration component currently is traversing.
        Returns:
        The current search path as an unordered set.

      • preCheck

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> preCheck()
        Performs a series of checks to determine whether running the model checker for the provided property, agent, and directives is opportune. Specifically, the following checks are performed:
        • Do percept rules occur in the agent?
        • Do communication primitives occur in the agent?
        • Do modules occur in the agent, and is PBS or POR enabled?
        Returns:
        A list of warnings to be displayed to the user.
